name: Project H.A.Z.A.R.D Zombie FPS
description:
Thrilling atmosphere, engaging plot, breathtaking dynamics, and hordes of enemies!

Apocalypse is here - don't waste your time! Go through hell full of bloodthirsty zombies, rescue survivors, and find the only hope!
Kill the zombies and survive in this offline sniper-shooting and horror zombie game!

FASCINATING STORY

The world has changed… Now it’s full of zombies, the walking dead doomed to crave flesh… You are a military sergeant, whose job is to rescue as many survivors as you can. One day, you receive the usual mission, but everything goes wrong…

AAA SHOOTING EXPERIENCE

Choose between a touch control or a joystick for AAA shooting experience!
Feel the full control and incredible dynamics of the game, playing with a mobile game controller. Use your skills to get the highest performance rate and achieve maximum rewards!

OFFLINE FPS FEATURES

- Easy control interface;
- Interactive environment;
- More than 20 unique levels;
- More than 30 types of enemies;
- Guns upgrade with plenty of different parameters;
- Original heavy-techno soundtrack;
- Stylized graphics.
